html:
Dubai, UAE: AVEVA, a global leader in engineering and industrial software, has been selected as one of the top ‘Channel Influencers of the Year’ by the editors at Channel Partners and Channel Futures in the annual 2021 Channel Influencer Awards. AVEVA was recognized for dedication to its channel business and for the focus on sustainability to drive innovation and business outcomes. The annual Channel Influencer Awards celebrate people, organizations, technology and trends that have made an impact on the Channel globally, especially during the pandemic.

AVEVA’s focus is on emerging technologies, such as artificial intelligence (AI), Cloud, digital twin, visualization, and data & analytics, which are helping organizations make impactful changes to improve the environment while also meeting business goals. AVEVA’s software enables the design and management of complex industrial assets like power and chemical plants, water treatment facilities and food and beverage factories – deploying IIoT strategies, big data, and AI to digitally transform industries.

Kerry Grimes, Head of Global Partners at AVEVA, said, “It is a great honor to be recognized for our relentless efforts in championing pioneering technologies that help make industrial companies sustainable and also author robust business outcomes for our network of channel partners. Our goal is to empower partners to help their customers achieve their ever-evolving digital business goals. Our recently launched partner program, AVEVA Select, enables our channel ecosystem to gain complete access to AVEVA’s comprehensive portfolio, empowering them to build capabilities and capitalize on the digital future.”

AVEVA Select aligns to both market and technology trends, offering programs designed to suit every product and solution specialization in the engineering and industrial segments. By leveraging the breadth of AVEVA’s software portfolio, AVEVA Select partners can now help their customers simplify design and optimize opportunities, and also maximize performance.

The AVEVA Partner Network has over 5,000 members providing opportunities for alliances, systems integrators, distributors, solution providers, and technology partners to actively engage and participate in the AVEVA community. With AVEVA Select, partners access the entire AVEVA portfolio through the channel that they have known and trusted, often for as long as 30 years.

"As we put the wheels in motion for our strategy for 2021 and beyond, we can see that we are well on track to meet our ambitious business goals and this would not be possible without the collaboration of our channel partners. We look forward to working even more closely with our partners and continuing to support them as their customers navigate the path to digital transformation,” Grimes concluded.

Send us your press releases to pressrelease.zawya@refinitiv.com
